lead_paragraph: Chris Gatling, a former N.B.A. star, was arrested on allegations he oversaw an online scheme using credit cards of people from across the country.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Player Is Accused of Fraud Scheme
headline.main: Ex-N.B.A. Player Is Accused of Fraud

snippet: Chris Gatling, a former N.B.A. star, was arrested on allegations he oversaw an online scheme using credit cards of people from across the country.
abstract: Former NBA All-Star Chris Gatling is arrested in Arizona in connection with online fraud scheme, and charged with aggravated identity theft.
